author: axic3354
content:
We have merged all the EOF discussions (1.1 and 2.0) into this "unified spec": https://notes.ethereum.org/@ipsilon/B1nnZ1fl3

This should contain the current suggestion for all changes, including creation. (There is an addition we forgot to write in is the "creator contract/precompile", which is a regular EVM contract using `CREATE4`. Since it can be called via a regular transaction, it eliminates the need to have a specific "create transaction".)
